name: ibis Brisbane

reviews.text: just recently stayed at the ibis. i amanaged to get a very cheap rate as there was a special on but you shoulb be able to get rooms for little over 100 dollars. best to book via their website as they let u cancel 24 hrs before and dont take any deposit.
reviews.title: good low-budget hotel. cant go wrong

reviews.text: 1st of all, dont expext much, it is after all a low budget option. however, it is prob the best bet for you're money. u know pretty much what u're gonna get if, like me, u have stayed in other ibis hotels.
reviews.title: Excellent Service, Close to CBD.

reviews.text: the service was acceptbale, nothing amazing there.
reviews.title: Ouch - The bed

reviews.text: all the rooms have just been renovated. they were adding the final touches when i left.
reviews.title: Good value, convenient location

reviews.text: if you do stay, make sure u ask for a room on the top floor with a view of the river. it comes complete with its own balcony, whilst the others dont!
reviews.title: Reasonable Hotel
Good hotel, handy location
reviews.text: Stayed here for six nights. Very pleasantly surprised to be checked in at approximately 11.00am - expected to have to wait until 2.00pm. Staff very efficent, friendly and helpful, and nothing was too much trouble.

description: The Ibis Brisbane is conveniently located in the city centre. The hotelfeatures 218 spacious and modern rooms, conference facilities, anda newly refurbished restaurant and bar. Ibis Brisbane has all the keyfeatures for a comfortable business or leisure stay and its convenientlocation means guests are only a short stroll from all that the city has to offer. You will experience exceptional value for money, convenience and friendly service.
